fields.label: Maximum number of consecutive months of mild drought or worse
fields.tagline_positive: Drought durations have increased from {baseline_value:.0f} to {end_value:.0f} months in {region_name} since 1976
fields.tagline_negative: Drought durations have decreased from {baseline_value:.0f} to {end_value:.0f} months in {region_name} since 1976
fields.tagline_no_change: Droughts have lasted on average {baseline_value:.0f} months in {region_name} since 1976

fields.label: Number of people within FEMA-designated flood hazard area
fields.tagline_positive: There were {value:,.0f} people in {region_name} living in a FEMA-designated floodzone as of 2011
fields.tagline_negative: There were {value:,.0f} people in {region_name} living in a FEMA-designated floodzone as of 2011
fields.tagline_no_change: There were {value:,.0f} people in {region_name} living in a FEMA-designated floodzone as of 2011

fields.tagline_negative: Yields for barley will decrease by {value:.2n}% by 2035
fields.tagline_no_change: Yields for barley will not change significantly by 2035
